member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.BinodalN
member.summary: Number of nodes in binode islands: two nodes with one link between them, disconnected from the rest of the graph

member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.TrinodalN
member.summary: Number of trinode islands: tri nodes with two or three links between them, disconnected from the rest of the graph

member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.PolinodalN
member.summary: Number of islands counting more then three linked nodes

member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.AllIslands
member.summary: Number of all islands, including the continent

member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.PolinodalRatio
member.summary: Node count ratio, in which polinode island nodes, participate in total node count

member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.Trinodal
member.summary: Number of trinode islands: tri nodes with two or three links between them, disconnected from the rest of the graph

member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.Polinodal
member.summary: Number of nodes in polinode islands counting more then three linked nodes

member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.NodeCount
member.summary: Cross category number of nodes in the Semantic Cloud

member.name: P:imbSCI.Graph.FreeGraph.freeGraphReport.LinkRatio
member.summary: Cross category average number of links per node, in the Semantic Cloud
